This site aims to provide an interactive guide to the trees in Bristol. It uses data from multiple sources, including
Bristol Tree Forum
Friends of St Andrews Park
Bristol City Council.

There are several ways to locate a tree:
Select a Collection of trees to view a map of all trees, then select an individual tree, either in the list or on the map to view details
Select a Species to view a map of all trees of that species or dataon the species itself
Use Search to search for a tree by collection, latin or common name, text in descriptions or proximity to a location.
Try this location-aware page on a smart-phone to locate and identify trees on the move. (Works with Firefox but not Chrome yet)

This project is a work by Chris Wallace and Mark Ashdown.
If you have any queries comments on the project, time to help validate the data, or collections of data to add, please get in touch.
